#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

char s[1000001];
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int a[26]={0},b[26]={0};
		long int ans=0;
		long int i;
		cin>>s;
		long int m[strlen(s)];
		for(i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
		{
			if(i%2==0)
			a[s[i]-97]++;
			else
			b[s[i]-97]++;
		}
		for(i=0;i<26;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]>=2)
			ans=ans+(a[i]*(a[i]-1))/2;
			if(b[i]>=2)
			ans=ans+(b[i]*(b[i]-1))/2;
		}
		ans=ans+strlen(s);
		cout<<ans<<"\n";
		
	}
}
